description: After completing the Employee-MS project, I gained valuable experience in web development and project management:
Technology Development: Improved skills in both front-end (ReactJS) and back-end (Node.js, Express) development.
Data Management: Learned how the data was transported from client to server, stored in database, and back.
Input Validation: Validated input data on both client and server side.
Authentication: Implemented authentication using JWT and refresh tokens.
Project Management: Use git to manage project, save source code, and roll back when errors occur.
Studying Backend Engineer course (Software Engineer fundamental + Backend Engineer) at Software Engineer - UniGap.
